The video is viral with the claim that B: chairman of the Haj committee Inayat Hussain was smeared with ink and beaten with slippers in Indore for extending his support to the National Register of Citizens (NRC) and the Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA).
The message in Hindi accompanying the vi: 3. The claim is viral on multiple social media platforms, including Twitter, Facebook, and WhatsApp.
Alt News conducted a fact: check and found that the video is actually from an unrelated incident at Ajmer Dargah, where a Khadim named Sheikh Bunty smeared ink on the Secretary of the institution and hit him with sandals. The incident was related to embezzlement and is from March 2018.
